mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM `payroll` AS p -- 工资单 LEFT JOIN `internship_info_by_student` AS iibs on iibs.relation_student_id=p.student_id LEFT JOIN `student_info` AS si on si.id=p.student_id LEFT JOIN internship_plan_info AS ipi on ipi.id=p.internship_id LEFT JOIN school_teacher_relation AS str on str.school_id=ipi.school_id LEFT JOIN `major_info` AS mj on mj.id=ipi.major_id LEFT JOIN `class_teacher_relation` AS ctr on ctr.teacher_id=str.teacher_id LEFT JOIN `class_info` AS ci on ci.id= ctr.class_id LEFT JOIN `grade_info` AS gi on gi.school_id=str.school_id -- 年级表 WHERE p.deleted=0 ORDER BY gi.grade_year,ci.class_name,p.create_time

SELECT p.id, p.student_id AS studentId, iibs.company_name AS companyName, p.date_time AS dateTime FROM payroll AS p LEFT JOIN internship_info_by_student AS iibs ON p.student_id=iibs.relation_student_id WHERE p.deleted=0 AND iibs.deleted=0
AND p.student_id=#{studentId}
